entry.title: Western Skies and Time Flies (AU august day 1&2)
entry.summary:
Author: ew_selfish_art

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,633Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 10

Summary: Marinette faces off with a magic user that tends to send things back in time- little did she know that she would be caught in a larger spell. One that sends her back decades all the way across the globe.Damian does what he can as Robin before getting hit with the same spell, and then does what he can to give them both hope of getting home.Western AU x Time travel AU x No Powers AU because there are no processed sugars manifesting in historical western america.

  • No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Marinette Dupain-Cheng | Ladybug/Damian Wayne
  • AU August
  • Western AU
  • Historical AU
  • Marinette doesnt have access to sweets in historical times so no powers
  • Damian is an Artist
  • Time Travel
  • Aged-Up Character(s)
  • AU Yeah AUgust (Miraculous Ladybug)
  • this is a rushed fic so there are plot holes the size of actual texas
  • please ignore historical inaccuracy unless you are willing to teach and provide sources
